descmd: The changes in this annual update to US Core have been reviewed and commented upon by the public through the January 2025 HL7 balloting process. The HL7 International Cross-Group Projects work group members have agreed to and voted on the resolution of the community comments. For a detailed list of the changes for this version, see the [Change Notes](http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/STU8/changes.html).
